alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Franklin, southeastern Crawford and Sebastian Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Fort Chaffee to Hartford. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Charleston... Greenwood... Barling... Lavaca... Mulberry... Mansfield... Hackett... Hartford... Huntington... Branch... Midland... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Bloomer... Washburn... Burnville... Fort Chaffee... Jenny Lind... Central City... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 24 and 29. Interstate 540 between mile markers 9 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
